channel.title: Laptop Advice:
channel.description:

item.title: Laptop Advice:
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

That’s awesome for the money, even if it is an AMD cpu, and the ‘dedicated’ graphics are awful, still well worth the money.

Gonna have to start moving all these laptop and computer topics to computer hardware discussion…

Read full topic
